Summary: looked like phoenix lights but stayed for
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around December 28th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswe were heading to usury mountain at first it looked like the Phoenix lights there were 5 at first than two went away at first I thought they were airliners but they weren't going anywhere. in 15 minutes we left the highway and lost sight of them and hour and a half later we saw them at the exact same place on our way back to gold canyon
